description: Sweet and saffron-scented, these apricots are gorgeous with low-fat Greek yoghurt. You can also use tinned apricots in winter.
steps: Put the water, sugar, cinnamon stick, saffron and honey into a pan and heat until the sugar has dissolved.
Simmer gently for five minutes before adding the apricots. Simmer for a further five minutes. Remove from the heat and discard the cinnamon stick.
Serve the apricots warm on a bed of yogurt, and drizzle over the syrup.
title: Greek apricots
